clustering

类 DensityClustering

  • java.lang.Object
    • clustering.Clustering
      • clustering.DensityClustering
  • 直接已知子类:
    DBScan, DensityPeaks

    public abstract class DensityClustering
extends Clustering
    The super class of any density-based clustering algorithms. It help setting the radius dc.

    Author: Fan Min minfanphd@163.com, minfan@swpu.edu.cn
    Copyright: The source code and all documents are open and free. PLEASE keep this header while revising the program.
    Organization: Lab of Machine Learning, Southwest Petroleum University, Chengdu 610500, China.
    Project: The cost-sensitive active learning project.

    Progress: Almost finished, further revision is possible.
    Written time: July 10, 2019.
    Last modify time: July 21, 2019.

      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      Compute the dc using the average distance.

    • 字段详细资料

      • dc

        double dc
        The distance threshold for density computation. For the density peak and DBScan algorithms.

      • diameter

        double diameter
        The diameter of the current block.

      • averageDistance

        double averageDistance
        The average distance of the current block.

      • DIAMETER_FOR_DC

        public static final int DIAMETER_FOR_DC
        Compute the dc using the diamter.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • AVERAGE_FOR_DC

        public static final int AVERAGE_FOR_DC
        Compute the dc using the average distance.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • dcScheme

        int dcScheme
        The scheme for computing dc.

      • dcRatio

        double dcRatio
        The dc ratio.

      • DEFAULT_DC_RATIO

        public static final double DEFAULT_DC_RATIO
        Default adaptive dc ratio.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • SPEED_UP_THRESHOLD

        public static final int SPEED_UP_THRESHOLD
        To speed up the computation of density.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • MAXIMAL_DISTANCE

        public static final double MAXIMAL_DISTANCE
        The max distance which cannot be exceeded..
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • densities

        double[] densities
        The density of each instance. For the density peak algorithm.

      • CUTOFF_KERNEL

        public static final int CUTOFF_KERNEL
        Use cutoff kenrel to compute the density.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • GAUSSIAN_KERNEL

        public static final int GAUSSIAN_KERNEL
        Use Gaussian kernel to compute the density.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • kernel

        int kernel
        The kernel.

      • smallerBlocks

        int[][] smallerBlocks
        Smaller blocks for speed up. It is produced by the kMeans algorithm now.

      • DensityClustering

        public DensityClustering(java.lang.String paraFilename,
                         int paraDistanceMeasure,
                         int paraDcScheme,

        The constructor.
        参数:
        paraFilename - The data set filename.
        paraDistanceMeasure - The distance measure in integer.
        paraKernel - The kernel function.

    • 方法详细资料

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        Initialize.

      • setAdaptiveDc

        public void setAdaptiveDc(double paraRatio)
        Set dc adaptively according to the dataset.
        参数:
        paraPairs - How many pairs of instances are employed.
        paraRatio - The ratio of the average distance.

      • setAdaptiveDc

        public void setAdaptiveDc(int[] paraBlock,
                          double paraRatio)
        Set dc adaptively according to the dataset.
        参数:
        paraBlock - The given block.
        paraPairs - How many pairs of instances are employed.
        paraRatio - The ratio of the average distance.

      • setDc

        public void setDc(double paraDc)
        Set dc.
        参数:
        paraDc - The given dc.

      • getDensity

        public double getDensity(int paraIndex)
        Get the density of the specified instance.
        参数:
        paraIndex - The index of the instance.

      • testComputeDensity

        public void testComputeDensity()
        Test the method.

      • computeDensities

        public void computeDensities(int[] paraBlock)
        Compute the densities.

      • computeDensitiesCutoff

        public void computeDensitiesCutoff()
        Compute the densities using cutoff.

      • computeDensitiesCutoff

        public void computeDensitiesCutoff(int[] paraBlock)
        Compute the densities using cutoff.
        参数:
        paraBlock - The given block for density computation. The density of each instance in the block is computed, and only other instances in the same block is considered.

      • computeDensitiesGaussian

        public void computeDensitiesGaussian(int[] paraBlock)
        Compute the densities using Gaussian kernel.

      • computeSmallerBlocks

        public void computeSmallerBlocks(int paraK)
        Compute the densities.
        参数:
        paraK - The number of blocks.

      • computeDensityEfficiently

        public void computeDensityEfficiently()
        Compute the density of each instance efficiently. It is implemented by first clustering using kMeans, where k = sqrt{n}
